result.title: Visual identity, promotional pack, and website
result.description: The visual identity and promotional pack will provide guidance on use of the projects colours logos funding acknowledgement and placement of EU emblem in project outputs and will provide boilerplate text for communicating the project and its aims for a variety of target groupsThe website deliverable document will demonstrate the first version of the ALIGNER website and will justify the relevant design decisions as well as detailing future plans for the websites further development as project results become available

result.title: Research roadmap for AI in support of law enforcement and policing
result.description: This document initially published in M12 and subsequently updated every six months will compile all intermediate results and information gathered from WPs 2 3 and 4 It will be targeted at LEAs policymakers funding agencies and researchers and provide them with gaps challenges and opportunities related to artificial intelligence solutions for LEAs

result.title: Communication strategy and roadmap structure
result.description: The communication and dissemination strategy will establish the approach and methods of communicating with the projects target groups and disseminating results This document will establish the projects key messages identify target audiences and define tactics and products to be employed In addition this document will provide the initial outline and publication timeline for the research roadmap

result.title: Policy recommendations
result.description: D23 will provide policy recommendations including direction trends guidance and operational information relating to gaps within the AI arena whilst providing an overview of the possible impacts benefits advantages and disadvantages from a societal and ethical perspective so that these can be reflected in the roadmap The first deliverable will be issued in M12 and updated once a year in line with subsequent issues of the roadmap
